segments.text: Steven , I'm going abroad by plane for the first time tomorrow . Can you give me some advice ? And what should I pay attention to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First , you should have enough sleep to get over the jet lag before the departure . Most people will suffer from jet lag for a few days after a long flight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will go to bed early tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . But I have a carsickness .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'd better bring some medicine for airsickness .
segments.speaker: S2
